snippet: A 23-year-old man was booked on arson and hate-crime charges in connection with a fire that started as congregants at a California mosque arrived for prayers Friday.
abstract: Carl James Dial is arrested and booked on five felony charges in relation to fire at Islamic Society of Coachella Valley in California.

byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: A 23-year-old man was booked on arson and hate-crime charges in connection with a fire that started as congregants at a California mosque arrived for prayers Friday.

headline.main: Man Charged With Arson in California Mosque Fire
headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Lighting Mosque Fire

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic Society of Coachella Valley (Coachella, Calif)
